data.text: @Jennie_Sidharta Hi Jennie. When travelling on a Starter Fare you can carry one piece of baggage up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm per person and one small item such as a laptop, purse or handbag. The total weight of all your cabin baggage mustn’t exceed 7 kilos. Please see here:https://t.co/V06mtl6D4l -H

data.text: @mhqal Hi Haiqal. I'm sorry to hear that your flight to Hat Yai in January was cancelled. So we can check this for you, can you provide your booking reference number along with your full name via DM? Thanks - H
@butchishere Thanks for tagging us. I hope you enjoy your flight to Singapore with us. Cheers! - Jerry :)

@JamesPenha I’m sorry to hear that you’re unhappy with our online check-in. I understand that this must have been frustrating for you and I appreciate you taking the time to provide me with the details of the error you experienced.  Thanks - Jerry
@kahhhmunnnnnnn Hi there, thanks for getting back to us. Please send us a DM with your booking reference and full name so we can check this further for you. Thanks - Lee
@kahhhmunnnnnnn Hi kahmun, thanks for your tweet. I’m quite unsure of the travel document you are referring to. Could you provide further details about it so we can check? Thanks - Lee

@jackylamyy Thanks for your tweet Jacky and I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received the copy of your itinerary. Kindly send us a DM with your name and booking reference number so we can check this for you. Thanks - Josh

urls.title: Checked baggage | Size and weight restrictions | Jetstar
urls.description: Your comprehensive reference to the size and weight restrictions for checked baggage on Jetstar domestic and international flights.

data.text: @KellyOngMas Hi Kelly, thanks for the tweet. It may help to know that your drinking water can be part of your checked baggage as long as you don’t exceed your checked baggage allowance. Kindly check our website https://t.co/L6Ior8K3sg for more information. Regards - Joie

data.text: @kevinbhealey 2/2 first and the sale fare is no longer available, other customers will experience errors and be returned to the start with the new price. I sincerely apologise that you missed out on this occasion but unfortunately, we're not able to offer the sale price retrospectively. - H

@kevinbhealey 1/2 Hi. Sale fares are limited and if the sale is popular and there are several people booking at the one time, it can mean some customers miss out. Fares aren't held during the booking process and are only confirmed when payment is taken so if someone finishes their booking

@kevinbhealey Hi. The sale is very popular and our website slowed a little due to the overwhelming increase in traffic. We make sure that our server allows for increased traffic and remains secure during sales like this. Sorry for the inconvenience this has caused you. Thanks - H

data.text: @KellyOngMas Hi Kelly, thanks for your tweet. Please know that for liquids, products must be in containers of 100ml or less (broadly equivalent to 100 grams or less) and carried together in a transparent, resealable plastic bag - https://t.co/2iFyVMMC8S. Thanks - Lee

@KellyOngMas Hi Kelly, thanks for your tweet. Yes, you can definitely include your Mickey tin can as part of your checked baggage as long as you will not exceed your allowance - https://t.co/XWL0RAphrS. Thanks - Lee
@yorkshiremblem 2/2 However, if you could DM us your booking reference so we can check if there's any comments left by the team in your booking. Thanks - Jerry

@yorkshiremblem 1/2 I'm sorry to hear that about your baggage on your flight from Singapore. The Social Media team don't have access to the systems and facilities the Baggage team use to trace customers bags.

@lloydthelostboy Thanks for tagging us. For any company to evolve it is essential for our customers to provide feedback about all parts of our business - so we appreciate your comments. Thanks - Jerry
RT @SUPERADRIANME: Check out the latest livery on @Jetstar_Asia A320 9V-JSB featuring iconic symbols of Northern Territory. Today the airli…
@ajollygdfellow Hi Ben, glad to hear that this has been resolved for you. We look forward to welcome you on-board soon! Cheers - Lee
@Timothe_Slr 2/2 I appreciate your concerns and I’m sorry we weren’t able to get back to you sooner. Thanks - Lee

@Timothe_Slr 1/2 Hi Timothe, thanks for your tweet. Our dedicated Customer Care team work hard every day to respond to customers who have lodged their concerns with us. It may take some time for us to investigate what has happened, and what we can do to help.

@ajollygdfellow Hi Ben, thanks for your tweet and sorry to hear if you have not received the vouchers you purchased. If you could DM us the email address listed when you created the voucher so we can further check. Thanks - Lee
@jsmfrnndz23 Hi Jas, thanks for your tweet. I’ve responded to your DM with further details. Thanks - Lee

@lovetasteu Hi Charlie, thanks for the tweet and I'm sorry to hear this. So we can check this out for you, kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name and we'll see on how we can assist. Regards - Joie

data.text: @sieweeds 2/2 Please note that the social media team don't have access to the systems and facilities the Baggage team use to trace customers bags. Kindly advise your brother to contact the Baggage Services team directly here: https://t.co/8TmdgXz6IB. Thanks - Josh

@sieweeds 1/2 Hi there. Thanks for your tweet and I'm sorry to hear about your brother's missing guitar upon arriving in Manila. Rest assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each luggage and to return them immediately after your brother arrived at his destination.
@Himanshu_HT Sorry to hear this Himanshu. You have every right to expect helpful, friendly and professional service, whenever you fly with us and I apologise if this was not your experience. –M
@Himanshu_HT Hi. Sorry to hear about your experience. If you could DM us your booking reference and about what happen so we can check this for you? Thanks - H
@livsosborne @alannguyen17 Hi Tammy. I'm sorry to hear that your flight from Singapore was delayed. Could you provide your booking reference via DM so we can look into this further? Thanks - H

data.text: @Only1ManicAmber Hi.  The social media team don't have access to the systems and facilities the Baggage team use to trace lost items, but if you let me know your booking reference number via DM, I can check if there's any comments left our team in your booking. Thanks - H

@jappepollentier Sorry to hear this Jappe. I’ve checked this and can confirm that our website is currently working fine. I suggest clearing the browser cache and cookies or try using a different browser. If you can’t complete the check-in online, I suggest to complete check-in at the airport. –M
@mehul_haria22 3/3 The Social media team don't have access to baggage tracing you can contact the Baggage Services team directly here: https://t.co/lBL1iu5SBJ. Thanks- M
@mehul_haria22 2/3 We always take care of every piece of luggage and return them in the condition we have received. Apologies if this wasn't the case for you.

@mehul_haria22 1/3 Hi Mehul, I'm sorry to hear that you missed your connecting flight. It’s always important for us to get every flight away on time and we also don’t want delays however, it is sometimes unavoidable to delay a flight due to operational and safety reasons.
@KellyOngMas Hi Kelly, drinks can be carried onboard but subject to liquids restriction. Please see https://t.co/2iFyVMMC8S for more information. –M

data.text: @FIENNYA Thanks for tagging us about your flight from Pekanbaru to Singapore. We certainly understand the importance of getting a flight away on time and we aim to do this with every one of our flights. So I'm glad that we're able to get you earlier to your destination. Cheers!- Jerry
@rickymamby Hi Rico, sorry to hear this. I’ve responded to your DM. Thanks - Lee
@rickymamby Hi Rico, The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to DM us in English so we can assist? Regards - Joie
@rickymamby Hi Rico, thanks for getting back to us and sorry to hear this. Please DM us your booking reference, full name, and flight details so we can check your options. Thanks - Lee
@rickymamby Hi Rico, sorry to hear of the delay to your flight. We'll get you on your way as soon as possible. Thanks - Lee
@livsosborne @hppVWK9 Hi there, thanks for your tweet. It may help to know that you can always check the status of our flights leaving Singapore here - https://t.co/bippLEBaNS. Thanks - Lee
@BEAyaNgLangit Thanks for the Tweet Bea. It may help to know that Manila terminal fee in not included in our fares. –M
@letientai299 Hi Tai, I'm sorry to hear about this. Kindly call us  so we can assist you further and visit this link here for phone numbers https://t.co/WyaikGh6hE. Thanks- M
@letientai299 2/2 website on unsupported browsers anymore. I suggest updating your browser or clear your browser cache and cookies. Please let us know how you go. Thanks- M

@letientai299 1/2 Hi Tai, I'm sorry to hear about your difficulties using our website. I can confirm that we don't have a reported system issue. However, we are upgrading our browser security standard. This means that customers will not be able to access Jetstar

@gonzalezmiguel Hi Miguel, thanks for the tweet. It may help to know that you can bring your empty bottle container as part of your carry-on for your upcoming flight with us. For more information, kindly see the link provided by M. Regards – Joie

@gonzalezmiguel Hi Miguel, are you able to confirm what kind of bottle container you're trying to bring on your flight? Alternatively, you may also check our baggage restriction here https://t.co/5Z3YANqied. Thanks- M
@StevenMartono 2/2 So we can further check from which terminal your flight from Jakarta to Singapore will be departing, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Thanks- Maye
